assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: KH Neochem Co., Ltd. researchs, manufactures, and sells of petrochemical productsin Japan and internationally. It offers a range of chemical products, such as alcohols, esters, ketones, glycol ethers, synthetic fatty acids, aldehydes, diols, hydrocarbons, and functional monomers. The company provides basic chemicals, including butyl alcohol and acetate, 2-ethyl hexyl alcohol, isononyl alcohol, ethylene glycol monobutyl ether, methyl isobutyl ketone, diisobutyl ketone, diethylene glycol monobutyl and triethylene glycol monobutyl ether, and diacetone alcohol for use in paints, inks, thinners, cleaners, detergents, plasticizer raw materials, and resin raw materials. It also offers performance materials, such as 2-ethyl hexanoic and isononanoic acid, diacetone acrylamide, and 1,3-butylene glycol for use in lubricants, water-borne paints, and cosmetics. In addition, the company provides electronic materials comprising propylene glycol monomethyl ether acetateP, and propylene glycol monomethyl ether-P for LCD panels and semiconductors. KH Neochem Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
